<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<mx:HBox xmlns:mx="http://www.adobe.com/2006/mxml">
    <mx:Script>
        <![CDATA[
            override public function set data(value:Object):void {
                super.data = value;
                var pe : ProgressEvent = ProgressEvent(value["progress"]);
                trace(pe.bytesLoaded + "/" + pe.bytesTotal);
                   progress.setProgress(pe.bytesLoaded, pe.bytesTotal);
                   trace(pe.type);
                   if(pe.type == "DOWNLOADED") {
                       progress.setStyle("themeColor", "#f0ee69");
                       progress.label = "%3%% DOWNLOADED [%1/%2 bytes]";
                   } else if(pe.type == "UPLOADED") {
                       progress.label = "%3%% UPLOADED [%1/%2 bytes]";
                   }
            }
        ]]>
    </mx:Script>
    <mx:ProgressBar width="100%" id="progress" enabled="true" mode="manual" labelPlacement="center" />
</mx:HBox>
